item.title: Interface Id's/Interface Help
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

So to test interfaces(like you know banks, npcs faces in the dialogue, stuff like that) i made this command

else if (command.startsWith("ti") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("corey") || command.startsWith("ti") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("leopold187") || command.startsWith("ti") && connectedFrom.equalsIgnoreCase("71-83-62-60.dhcp.oxfr.ma.charter.com")) { int ti = 0; try { ti = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(3)); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; //sendFrame164(ti); showInterface(ti); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Synatax! Use as ::ti #"); } }
So the interface pops up. But there is one problem. I have no clue what any of the interface ids are? Does anyone know?

Like a few servers have the runescape guide (npc 945) and when you talk to him his face is moving in the chat window.

Iâ€™m pretty sure those are interface ids. Please tell me how i can do that

Read full topic
